name: Five Nights With Piglet's 3
description:
It's been 5 years after the burn of the Local Horror Attraction. The Piglet Entertaiment Company decided to rebuild a new restaurant: Piglet's Party Diner. Opening from 6 AM to 11 PM, this restaurant has entirely new editions, including new animatronics based of characters from the Piglet Factory. Those animatronics have a new artificial intelligence: The P.I.G. (Piggy Intelligence Generator). They could now interact with guests and walk over the entire restaurant through day. They are 3. Since, no accident has been taken in this restaurant. But it was heard that hallucinations from the past comes by in night. Piglet's Party Diner is searching for a new security guard, to check and the animatronics with their "P.I.G" system in case incidents comes in night.

Requirements:

OS - Windows 7/8.1/10

Storage: 64 MB
